ygData.subject: Re: My Experience With a Level 2 Cleric
ygData.msgSnippet: Your mana is based on how much wisdom you have.. did you put any points into wisdom? Plus at level 1-2 you shouldn t have a whole lot of mana anyways. And if
ygData.messageBody:
Your mana is based on how much wisdom you have.. did you put any points into
wisdom? Plus at level 1-2 you shouldn't have a whole lot of mana anyways.
And if Minor Healing healed more it wouldn't be minor would it? =)

-- Nali


>From: "bigmack" <bigmack@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: <EQ-clerics@onelist.com>
>Subject: [EQ-Clerics] My Experience With a Level 2 Cleric
>Date: Sun, 22 Aug 1999 18:45:24 -0400
>
> I just created a Cleric today and got him up to level 2. At the guild
>shop I noticed so many classes of spells...attack spells, healings spells,
>and other spells were all handled by different NPC's. I'll be spending A
>LOT of money on spells. I do have a minor gripe with clerics, though.
>They just don't have enough total mana, and the Minor Healing spell isn't
>strong enough. I was grouped up with a Warrior and after wasting all of my
>mana healing him four times, only half of his health had grown back.
>Clerics need more mana! What do you think?
>
>Albus the Cleric, on The Tribunal Server
